original_title: Sanasa Life Insurance to provide insurance services to Sri Lanka Freedom Employees Union
original_body_lines: Sanasa Life Insurance introduced a group life insurance scheme for the wellbeing of the government and private sector employees. More than 21,000 employees of government, semi-government, and corporative institutions have been covered by this insurance scheme by present. Marking another significant milestone, the Sri Lanka Freedom Employees Union (SLFEU), a leading trade union in the country with a large member base, recently got into an agreement with Sanasa Life Insurance, so the SLFEU members will be able to enjoy a wide range of insurance facilities offered by Sanasa LIfe Insurance. The Chief Executive Officer (CEO) of Sanasa Life Insurance Ivan Nicholas and the General Secretary of SLFEU Lesley Devendra signed the relevant agreement at Sanasa Life Insurance Headquarters in Colombo.
